query:
INSERT INTO "review_votes" ("user_id", "review_id", "vote")
        SELECT $1, $2, $3
        WHERE
            EXISTS (
                SELECT "user_id"
                FROM "users"
                WHERE "user_id" = $1
            ) AND
            EXISTS (
                SELECT "review_id"
                FROM "reviews"
                WHERE "review_id" = $2
            )
        ON CONFLICT ("user_id", "review_id") DO UPDATE SET
            "vote" = $3
        RETURNING "user_id", "review_id", "vote";
